reviewText: Little Bear is great for learning how to play and interact with friends. Wonderful for little ones, while enjoyable for adults to watch with them.

I wish there were more episodes in the series!  The story lines keep the imagination and innocence of children.... not to mention, teaching the respect of parents/authority, having the diversity of friends and tenderness to take care of animals. Great animation and bright colors to keep toddlers (or older children) interested.
